channel.title: PLZ Help me Connect SOURCE TO CLIENT!
channel.description:
I am new at making rsps and i have no idea how to connect my source(317) to my client..
can you please help me??

item.title: PLZ Help me Connect SOURCE TO CLIENT!
item.dc:creator: @smitherdrago smitherdrago
item.description:
@smitherdrago wrote:

look in the gui.java and look for “127.0.0.0” or look for something that will say “local host” and change then to your no -ip tell me if this helped you or look in your client.java and look for the same thing

Read full topic

item.title: PLZ Help me Connect SOURCE TO CLIENT!
item.dc:creator: @lilman7 lilman7
item.description:
@lilman7 wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

You need to find where the IP is handled at, it would help to direct us to the thread (download) that your using so we can see and help you understand where to locate the IP.

MediaFire

Pk Planet Client V6.rar

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.

Theres the link plz help.
